      library(pins)
      library(plumber)
      library(rapidoc)
      library(vetiver)

      if (FALSE) {
          library(glmnet)
          library(parsnip)
          library(recipes)
          library(stacks)

          library(workflows)
      }
      b <- board_folder(path = "<redacted>")
      v <- vetiver_pin_read(b, "frog-stack")
